name: CHECK_INPUT
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2018.

Explore inside the transmissions from a mysterious public access TV station

Press 'E' near the microphones to "tune" and to advance dialogue.

WASD to move, mouse to look.

Credits:

Seanna Musgrave - @evilseanbot

Thomas Newlands - @thnewlands
